WorkItem.Description: It appears there is a very visible discrepancy between SimCraft and Rawr concenring SoW. If one replaces 416 Spine Trinket/410 CotC with 416 Spine/SoW one sees an important DPS gain in SimCraft. However, Rawr does not optimize for it even if used manually.
WorkItem.Summary: [Arcane Mage] Discrepancy between SimCraft and Rawr on SoW

Comments.Message: As I posted on MMO simc doesn't model correctly the damage proc trinkets in the current version. I even posted in that same thread where this was brought up.
I misunderstood. I thought you were concluding it's not BiS there.
Oops, I misunderstood here apparently as well. OK, I'll re-read your message.
